Logging Classes¶

LogFile¶

class SurveyManager.utility.Logging.LogFile¶

Helper class for creating log file entries. The log file location is specified by the FolderPath assigned in the constructor and cannot be changed while the program is running.

Public Functions

void AddEntry (string logtext)¶

Add a new entry to the log file. The date and time is added automatically.

Param logtext

The text to add.

void WriteToFile ()¶

Write the contents of the Entries dictionary to the files specified by FolderPath.

Public Members

Dictionary<DateTime, string> Entries = new Dictionary<DateTime, string>()¶

The list of Log entries for this session.

Properties

string FolderPath { get; set; }¶

The folder that log files should be saved in.

string FileName { get; set; } = "default.log"¶

The name of the log file to be saved in the FolderPath.

string FullPath { get; set; }¶

The full path to the log file; combines the FolderPath and FileName.
